name: Wondervision
description:
Description:

After losing their glasses, the player embarks on a journey to a magical world in an attempt to retrieve them

Team members: 

Mariana Holtz Betiol: main artist, UI, level building, documentation

Yifan Zheng: facilitated meetings, main programmer, UI, music

Emily Xie: facilitated most playtests, main level designer, level building, documentation

Clare Lee: main level builder, level design, 

Apart from our main roles, we all had interchangeable duties like looking for assets for the game and generally building the game in Unity.
